name: White Space (Strikers-7)
description:
WASD- To move around

Space- To jump

Left-Click- To Pick up

Mouse- To look around

White Space is a mysterious place surrounded by nothing but endless white space with only you and your obstacles such as mazes, parkour, and rooms with hidden keys. A first-person adventure game in which you have to solve each spatial puzzle to find where you are and where the exit is -if there is one. Each room is different from the last with its own room color associated with the key also matching in color and using the key to move to the next room with help from those in the rooms
